title: Types, Type Conversion, and C# Language Syntax
description: In this first episode of C# with CSharpFritz, Jeff introduces himself and our series of beginner friendly live streams talking about and teaching how to get started with C# and .NET development.  This episode focuses on declaring variables, using types, and converting between those types.

title: Making our own Types with Classes, Scope, and Interfaces
description: Last week we learned about variables and some of the built-in types in C#.  This week, Fritz takes us through the process of creating our own Types and what we can do with them

title: Learning to Make Our Own Types with Class - Part 2: Methods, Events, and Delegates
description: Are you just starting to learn C#? Maybe you're a professional and want a refresher talk. Tune in to the next C# with CSharpFritz as we discuss creating classes with methods, events, and delegates.  We'll use Jupyter Notebooks and .NET Interactive so that you can work through the samples with Fritz as he teaches in this talk-show formatted session. Community Links: https://www.theurlist.com/csharpfritz_ep3

title: Conditionals and Loops
description: Are you just starting to learn C#? Maybe you're a professional and want a refresher talk. Tune in to the next C# with CSharpFritz as we discuss conditionals and loops.  We'll use Jupyter Notebooks and .NET Interactive so that you can work through the samples with Fritz as he teaches in this talk-show formatted session.
